name: Service Corporation International
description: Service Corporation International (SCI) is the largest provider of funeral and cemetery services in North America. Founded in 1962, SCI operates over 1,500 funeral homes and more than 500 cemeteries across the United States and Canada. The company is dedicated to helping families plan meaningful memorials and navigate the complexities of end-of-life arrangements. Through its various brands, SCI offers a wide range of services including traditional funerals, cremation options, memorialization, and pre-planning services. The company prides itself on its commitment to customer service and community engagement, ensuring that every family receives compassionate care during their time of need. SCI also invests in technology to enhance the customer experience, offering online planning tools and memorial services that meet the needs of today's families. With a strong focus on operational excellence and sustainability, SCI is redefining the way families celebrate life and honor their loved ones. The company’s mission is to provide personalized and dignified services that reflect the individuality of each person, while also fostering a culture of respect and integrity among its employees.
